title: Ep. 1035 - The Libs Go Full Roe V. Wade Meltdown
description:
A CNN commentator laments that the repeal of Roe means it won’t be as easy to kill people with mental disabilities, AOC and Maxine Waters take a break from investigating an insurrection to instigate one, and a new USA Today poll has great news for Republicans in the wake of the Supreme Court’s ruling.

Become a Daily Wire member to watch summer blockbuster “Terror on the Prairie”, the most talked about documentary in America “What Is A Woman”, and so much more. Use code KNOWLES for 25% off your new membership: https://utm.io/ueHMa
